questions.question: Which is not one Dwight's favorite things?
What is Pam's favorite flavor yogurt?
What song is played at Jim and Pam's wedding?
choices: Can't Help Falling in Love by Elvis Presley

questions.question: What color shirt does Dwight always wear?
Who does Michael give rabies to?
Where does The Office take place?
What does Michael burn his foot on?
Who started the fire in the building?

messages.60: You FAILED! Michael Scott would be utterly disappointed.
messages.70: You didn't quite fail... but you didn't quite pass. Clearly, you aren't a true Office fan...
messages.80: You recieved a passing grade for your Office knowledge, which is way higher than Kevin has ever scored on a test...
messages.90: Not too shabby. With this score, you could become the best Assistant to the Regional Manager out there!
messages.100: WOW! You know your stuff. You deserve a Dundie Award for this score!
